Name: Putin Run Away From Trump
About the game: 2288, alternative reality, the future, Russia has long been inhabited by robots 'sinebota', there are very few people left, but it is necessary to collect taxes. Tsar Putin could not collect one tax, so he called for the assistance of President Trump, he agreed to help, but then, unexpectedly, he decided to deceive Tsar Vladimir and took all the bitkoyins to himself. Tsar Putin could not tolerate such lawlessness and took away all the bitcoins, then Trump chased him. Now your goal is to run away from Trump and collect along the way bitcoins. Features: -You will be able to play for Tsar Putin and see Russia in the future, in an alternative reality -You can escape from Trump and collect taxes along the way -Game for patriots -Game genre: Runer -Infinite and funny gameplay (just run, when you have to jump and collect taxes (bitcoins) -Several cards for the game of your choice -Atmospheric soundtrack -Steam achievements
